data.title: Flicknife Records
data.meta_description: Official site of Flicknife Records - Defining 'indie' since 1980. Buy CDs and merchandise online!
data.text:
Click here for a printable version of the list

THIS LIST CONTAINS THE MOST IMPORTANT OF FLICKNIFE RECORD RELEASES.

ALL UNDERLINED RELEASES IN BOLD, WERE SILVER DISC ACCREDITED.

ALL IMAGES IN THE SITE'S SLIDESHOWS APPEAR AS LISTED.

THE TRUST

The Trust started as a project involving many record labels,but as Flicknife Records was the only label to actually bring any artists to the project,The Trust became a sub label of Flicknife Records.

The main releases under "TRUST" were: The Barracudas 'House of Kicks’ (TRUEP 002: mini album) and The Specimen 'Sharp Teeth’ (TRUE 001 7”/ TRUE 12001 12”).

LIP SERVICE

Lip Service was created in late 80's and released Artist's Interviews in 12" gatefold disks,which included a photo of the Artist and a Biography. The interviews were taken by the legendary Kris Needs and the sound quality was superb. The main releases were LSM001 : Johny Lydon and LSM002 : Billy Idol.

SG ( Soho Girl Records)
